author: Anton Petrov
description:

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about a confirmation for one of the most massive black holes ever seen found inside the famous Cosmic Horseshoe Einstein lens

title: Black Hole at the Maximum Mass Limit Confirmed Inside the Cosmic Horseshoe
